name: Crazy Eggs Bubble Shoot
description:
The new Egg Shooter bubble shoot saga a famous game in the market today.
Player will pass hundreds of addictive levels to explore and play along with the game.
New kind of crazy egg hunting with bubbles blaster and cute egg gun launch. This game is very cool and suitable for all age.
How to play shooter dynamite egg deluxe:
- Players use hand modifier guns launch to rotate and touch the screen to shoot the eggs to the eggs of the same color on the side. The main mission is destroy all the ball, dinosaur eggs and bubble ball. To finish the game, player can apply different strategies.
- Clear the current puzzle level to unlock the next bubble blast level.
- Shot the eggs and match 3 or more same egg color to pop, crush and drop and victory.
